About Me

Hi, there! I am currently a machine learning engineer at TikTok. Ex @ Tencent Game, Lightspeed & Quantum Studios Group. Prior to this, I obtained my M.S. degree from UC San Diego, advised by Prof. Pengtao Xie and Prof. Julian McAuley, and my B.E. degree from Northwestern Polytechnical University(NPU), respectively.

My research interest includes Applied Machine Learning in recommender system and game industry. Please feel free to find my resume here.
